item.title: Robinhood’s Vlad Tenev has led a trading revolution to become a new Wall Street power

item.title: Trump administration eyes cuts to student-loan forgiveness for public servants

item.title: My job is offering me a payout. Should I take a $61,000 lump sum or $355 a month for life?
item.description: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years.”

item.title: Why Republicans are defending this lucrative Medicaid scam
item.description: Guess who’s paying for the costs of hospitals and nursing homes in red states?
